items.sentence: Our problem now is how to persuade Tom to quit.
Tom poured some milk into a saucer for his cat.
I doubt Tom will want to go to Boston with you.
This is the only company I\'ve ever worked for.
Tom wanted to stick around for a few more days.
I think this must be the place where Tom lives.
I think you know that we have to do that today.
I think you know that we need to do that today.
Have your students been giving you a hard time?
Tom didn\'t reveal his real identity to anyone.
